channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Suspect in Charlie Kirk shooting likely to face charges Tuesday before first court hearing
item.description: Prosecutors are looking at filing a capital murder charge against the Utah man jailed in the killing of conservative activist Charlie Kirk.

item.title: Trump administration joins Republicans’ campaign to police speech in reaction to Kirk’s killing
Georgia Supreme Court declines to hear Fani Willis’ appeal of her removal from Trump election case
